comments.body: uhhh did you try to toggle it?

I’ve had it auto switch to HDR during game twice for 1-2 seconds in about 3 hours of gameplay so far. TCL tv will show HDR logo in corner of the screen. I don’t know what triggers it or even if I can see a difference since it switches back so quick.
I tried to enable it in the GameUserSettings.ini but it doesn't do anything. I really don't get why this isn't an ingame option?!?

wish is could use my switch controller to play mc windows 10
This seems cool but it feels way to OP. It takes all the fun out of finding a good piece of gear and means you can have a "perfect" set of items really quickly.

the fun of the game CAN come from rng loot ONLY if the gameplay on its own is challenging and rewarding but the enemies are completely unfair, we don't have decent options to dodge enemies' attack because we don't even have invincibility frames by default

i approve the enchantsmith that allows you to roll the enchantments in one selected slot.

i thought they were doing that, maybe they wont have the staue but maybe it will be in the game files

Minecraft dungeons staff,

We all know how much Minecraft dungeons has evolved and there have been some complaints from the players side. We request few features that would help make Minecraft dungeons better, The staff has gifted Minecraft dungeons players the multiplayer tower event that has made minecraft dungeons a better game. Another update we would like to have to improve the quality of the multiplayer aspect of the game will be lobbies. Minecraft dungeons is supposed to be a cross-platform game that is meant to played with friends, but due to the game slowly declining in popularity we request a feature that lets us join public lobbies so other players can join and just go through levels together. If they dont want to play with online players they can switch of their lobby and play by the own. I personally think this would be an amazing idea for the game as now people will be able to play online and explore with other adventures, Thank you
i think Mojang should add new base weapons, armour and ranged to the game to increase the end game content of Minecraft dungeons and also new bosses will be cool

My idea is to make more difficulty in the game and the difficulty I am think about is hell, impossible, demi god,god,true god,high god, peak God difficulty.The other idea is to makes make the enhancement not random and gilded effects not random as well.The idea to make the enhancement not random by make 50-200 gold for random enhancement 250-500 for ur choice enhancement.As for idea for make the gilded effect not random make a new currency by mixing emerald and gold together and have the player unlock new merchant at hell difficulty. After that u have price for random gilded effect as 750-1000 new currency for a random and 1000-1500 to choice ur gilded effect.The other idea is to make the impossible difficult to to increase ur enhancement up to 5 to 10 level. at Demi god difficulty u can combine max level enhancement together to make new random enhancement and add a special attack.  True god difficulty the enhancement are not random and add random domain enhancements . High  God and preak god difficulty are like system impossible to true difficulty but with domin enhancement instead

I don't think difficulty scales though.
You can replay Squid coast in any offline game but the difficulty isn't scale-able. I am assuming this is to prevent rampant emerald and fireworks farming?
Oh! It as to be an offline game. Didn't know that, Thanks!

Yeah I want some kind of map at squid coast. maybe something simple like "The Arch Illager Has sent his hordes to attack you, eliminate the threat so you may go on to fight another day." A nice little dungeon so you can explore squid coast some more would be fun.
No, it's a singleplayer coop game, it does not need battlepass...

The last thing I want for Minecraft Dungeons is to become like Fortnite.
no one said it was Fortnite. At least this battle pass would give you exclusive weapons that no on can get like in Pixel Gun 3D.
I think Seasonal Events can be added, but Battle Pass is not necessary for now

To get eyes of Ender players must kill Endermen for the Pearls and Blazes for the Blaze Powder like in vanilla. Also, the Orb of Dominance should become a tesseract rather than a sphere.
Hold up... 18 Eyes of Ender? I thought you only needed 12. Also... You & me have the exact same mindset. :)

Allow the overlay transparent map to be reduced in size and moved to a corner.
Agree - when I got a TNT block I assumed i'd be able to use it to open up a shortcut or secret area or something. Also there's lots of 'things' around the map, but hardly any can be interacted with.

We need this!!!!!!

By the way, what I mean by "even though it inflicts poison like they do" is that it doesn't spawn a poison cloud which they can walk out from, but it actually makes the target poisoned, just like how jungle poison works.
Jungle poison really makes poison cloud and dipping poison look pathetic, but I agree that it makes sense that dipping poison should work like jungle poison, it would be way more useful then
I agree with this post, it would make it so that weeping and twisting vines bow are not the only bows that can do jungle poison
I agree so much

+1 on this! As a father of four whereof three loves Dungeons, it's many times we want to play. The issue is that the levels can be quite long, and I rarely have the time to sit down that long becuase I have many other chores to do. So either shorter levels or preferably the possibility to save during a level.
That sounds epic
I agree the claymore outshines it in every respect
I just assumed radiance on bows should only be useful in a party when you have others in the front line.
This could be a good idea for solos but surely if you're playing with friends who are melee then you would rather heal them because they are in the main fight?

The radiance on melee is much bigger than the radiance on bows, so it must be by design. I think they specifically don't want easy/safe distance healing on purpose. Just get leaching on your bow instead IMO.
Radiance is already broken. I don't think it needs changed at all.
Just to add on to this... Enderman are apparently immune to water! I got frustrated when I found this out.

I understand where you are coming from, but as Minecraft Dungeons is another game, the mobs should behave the best way to support this ARPG kind of playstyle, which don't have to match the Minecraft mobs.

If you want to know which mobs do what, the (here) suggested encyclopedia would be a nice way.

I don't think creeper should creep in this game. Reason? It can't. Minecraft is in first person so creeper can creep behind you then blow up. MCD is in third person so there's no "behind you". Also, rolling away from creepers works most of the time, and weirdly, wolves can tank it.
creepers yes. i have deid so many times!!!
